description:
Welcome to the perfect vacation getaway: Borgo Marina. Be warned, there’s mysteries around every corner in this Italian paradise. Befriend the locals, find clues, and play your cards right to uncover the town’s secrets in this story-driven adventure.

Game Features:

Save Borgo Marina: Diana needs a break and some inspiration for her writing, and what better inspiration than the Italian inspired Borgo Marina! However, a thief is disrupting Diana’s getaway and it’s up to her to stop them!

Meet the Locals: Meet and befriend the residents of Borgo Marina. Invite them to various activities such as fishing, cooking meals, and games to deepen your relationship and progress their individual questlines. Who knows, maybe some of these villagers are looking for more than just friendship?

Harness the Chronolens: Use your mystical Chronolens to investigate crime scenes. Take a look at the past to unlock new clues in the present to piece together what happened at each crime scene.

Italian inspired paradise: The Italian developers at Memorable Games took inspiration from the beautiful country to create Borgo Marina. Explore the sun soaked city as a virtual tourist and immerse yourself in the beautiful world they’ve created.
